readAndAcceptTerms: I have read and accept the terms and conditions.
recoverPasswordInfo: we will send you an email with the link to change your password. Enter a valid email address below.
recoverPasswordConfirmation: We have send you an email with a confirmation link. Please follow the link to reset your password.
changePasswordInfo: Enter your old and new password to make a change.
changeUsernameInfo: to change your username, enter your credentials and a valid email address you want change to.
changeUsernameConfirmation: We have send you an email with a confirmation link. Please follow the link in the email to confirm.
deleteAccountInfo: you can request your account termination. Once you send the request, we will send you an email with the link. Follow the link to confirm your account deletion.
deleteAccountSuccess: We have send you an email with a confirmation link. Please follow the link in the email to confirm.
registrationInfo: Please enter the following information to create an account.
registrationConfirmation: We have send you an email with a confirmation link. Please follow the link in the email to confirm.

acceptTermsWhenSignIn.message: by signing in, you agree to our $t(account:acceptTermsWhenSignIn.terms) and that you have read our $t(account:acceptTermsWhenSignIn.privacy).
